text:
Anshula Kapoor Rings In Her 26th Birthday In Singapore & It's An Adorable Fam Jam!
Anshula Kapoor Rings In Her 26th Birthday In Singapore & It's An Adorable Fam Jam!
Amidst all the ups and down in the Kapoor family in 2018, the family stood by each other in thick and thin. To end the year on a happy note, the Kapoors have flown to Singapore to ring in Anshula Kapoor's 26th birthday.
Bollywood producer Boney Kapoor along with son Arjun Kapoor, daughters Anshula, Janhvi and Khushi are in Singapore for a vacation.
Arjun, who has time and again expressed his love for his baby sister wrote,
"Happy birthday Ansh... ur an extension of me, the best part of me & u always shall be the world to me...#happybirthdayanshula #bestsisterever#growinguptoofast.
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
The birthday will become an extended new year celebration as they will be seen celebrating it all together.
Agencies
The pictures from their Singapore vacay are all over the internet and it proves how Kapoors modern family set up is something that is both aspirational and mature. Have a look!
title: Anshula Kapoor Rings In Her 26th Birthday In Singapore & It's An Adorable Fam Jam!
description: Amidst all the ups and down in the Kapoor family in 2018, the family stood by each other in thick and thin. To end the year on a happy note, the Kapoor's have flown to Singapore to ring in Anshula Kapoor's 26th birthday. Bollywood producer Boney Kapoor along with son Arjun Kapoor, daughters Anshula, Janhvi and Khushi headed to Singapore.
